sections.heading: 01|Person defined.Effective:September 24, 1999Latest Legislation:House Bill 58 - 123rd General AssemblyPDF:Download Authenticated PDFAs used in this chapter, "person" means any person, partnership, joint-stock company, unincorporated association, society, municipal corporation, or other corporation
